description: Controls ZenBlink procedural face emotion on the MetaHuman. Sets the emotion type, animation strength, blend weight, and blend mode at runtime.

POST.description: Sets the MetaHuman face emotion and animation blend parameters

params.Emotion: string - emotion enum name (see list below)
params.Strength: number - FaceEmotionStrength 0.0-1.0 (how intense the emotion appears)
params.Blend: number - FaceAnimationBlend 0.0-1.0 (blend between default slot and ZenBlink animation)

blendModes.Override: Replaces the current face animation entirely
blendModes.BlendByWeight: Blends the emotion with the current face animation by weight

POST.notes: Strength controls how pronounced the emotion is on the face. Blend controls the mix between the default animation slot and ZenBlink's procedural animation. Use BlendByWeight when lip-sync is active to layer emotion on top of speech.
